CmdLine: apk --update add --no-cache wget ca-certificates python py-setuptools py-pip &&     pip install elasticsearch-curator==5.5.4 && 	apk del py-pip
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget -q -O /tmp/consul-template.tgz https://releases.hashicorp.com/consul-template/${CONSUL_TEMPLATE_VERSION}/consul-template_${CONSUL_TEMPLATE_VERSION}_linux_amd64.tgz     && echo `sha256sum /tmp/consul-template.tgz`     && echo "${CONSUL_TEMPLATE_SHA256} /tmp/consul-template.tgz"     && echo "${CONSUL_TEMPLATE_SHA256}  /tmp/consul-template.tgz" | sha256sum -c -     && tar zxf /tmp/consul-template.tgz -C /usr/local/bin     && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/consul-template     && rm /tmp/consul-template.tgz
Commands.Name: run
